-------------------------------







Simple Bookmarks.
A bookmarks tree popup extension for Chrome.




Left click = Current Tab
Left click + Shift = New Tab
Left click + Alt  = New Tab
Left click + Ctrl = New Tab in background

Right click = New Tab
Middle click = New Tab in background

Right click on one of the folders = Open all bookmarks

Middle click on one of the folders = TreeNode Expand/Collapse
**Left click + Shift

Right click + Alt = Delete
Right click + Ctrl = Delete
Right click + Shift = Rename

Alt+Ctrl+Left-Drag = Move



*** ATTENTION
http://developer.chrome.com/extensions/bookmarks.html#property-MAX_WRITE_OPERATIONS_PER_HOUR





********* ATTENTION *********
---- Window Mode ----
Disable CTRL+mouse wheel zooming in Chrome?

I don't know of any way to disable scrolling, but you could use Ctrl+0 to return to 100%.
*****************************





--------
Keyboard shortcuts  (*Disable IME)

Down                = j or ; or /
Up                  = k or :
Collapse folder     = o
Open                = space   Alt(New Tab)  Ctrl(New Tab in background)

Extensions          = e
Bookmarks Manager   = b
History             = h
Downloads           = d
Clear Browsing Data = c

Store Tabs          = s+shift
Load Tabs           = l+shift

Recent Bookmarks    = r
Search Folders      = f
Search              = s

Pin/Unpin           = p
Pin/Unpin All Tabs  = p+shift
Close All Tabs      = x+shift
Expand All          = n
Collapse All        = u

Window Mode On/Off  = w

Options             = o+shift

Search mode ----
Down                = ; or /
Up                  = :
Open                = space   Alt(New Tab)  Ctrl(New Tab in background)
--------
